column4: mmm this computer is on breezy but the packages seem out of date, I've done aptitude update etc but ... for example ffox is still 1.07 instead of 1.5 and synaptic seems out of date 0.57.4
they cannot update firefox in breezy because it'd break too many dependancies
ubuntu stable is more up to date than debian stable
and dapper is just around the corner
is there an equivilant to unstable/sid
I have the same issue w/ my father in law.. OO keeps dying on his power point presentations...
so far my family rather likes linux so win for me...less tech support ^^
